<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Arundhat (The Sacred Perfume)](/Deities.aspx?ID=186)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 312, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Arundhat was previously included in Pathfinder Lost Omens: Gods and Magic with ghostly touch as a cleric spell. Players may use either the version from that book or this book, but cannot use both. This choice must be made at the time the character is created._

Arundhat is the god of blossoms and scent, most commonly worshipped in Vudra. While followers who worship deities of war or strength often consider Arundhat's portfolio a little lackluster, to those with the right knowledge, the humble flower can accomplish far more than a simple show of force. Arundhat's mastery of botanicals and scented oils can bring someone back from near death, sway a person to passion, or calm an agitated mob.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Practice herbalism, tend to sacred flowers, offer appropriate flowers to other divinities

**Anathema** Dispose of waste near flowers, harvest flowers without offering the proper prayers, dispose of withered flowers improperly

**Area of Concern**
blossoms, diplomacy, scent

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, N, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Deities/Arundhat.png" />
</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

**Domains** [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282)

- **4th**
[Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)

- **8th**
[Burning Blossoms](/Spells.aspx?ID=878)

</column>
